com.tuya.iotapp.device.api

Interface IDevice

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DeviceBusiness

    public IDevice

    interface IDevice

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void modifyDeviceName(java.lang.String deviceId, java.lang.String deviceName, ResultListener<java.lang.Boolean> listener)
      Modify the device info.
      void queryCommandSetWithCategory(java.lang.String category, ResultListener<com.tuya.iotapp.device.bean.DeviceStandardCommandBean> listener)
      Get the device commandSet set from category name. The commandSet set by category is the richest commandSet set under Tuya public version category for developers to use as a reference. If you are a platform developer, it is recommended that you can follow this category for developing.
      void queryCommandSetWithDeviceId(java.lang.String deviceId, ResultListener<com.tuya.iotapp.device.bean.DeviceStandardCommandBean> listener)
      Get the device v set from deviceID. Query the commandSet supported by the device, and the acquired commands can be used to issue control.
      void queryDeviceInfo(java.lang.String deviceId, ResultListener<com.tuya.iotapp.device.bean.DeviceBean> listener)
      Get the detail info of the specific device.
      void queryDeviceSpecification(java.lang.String deviceId, ResultListener<com.tuya.iotapp.device.bean.DeviceSpecificationBean> listener)
      Get device specification properties, including commandSet set and state set.
      void queryDeviceStatus(java.lang.String deviceId, ResultListener<java.util.List> listener)
      Get the latest device status.
      void queryDevicesInfo(java.lang.String[] deviceIds, ResultListener<com.tuya.iotapp.device.bean.DeviceListBean> listener)
      Get the full details of a list of devices.
      void queryDevicesStatus(java.lang.String[] deviceIds, ResultListener<java.util.List> listener)
      Get the latest status of multiple devices.
      void removeDevice(java.lang.String deviceId, ResultListener<java.lang.Boolean> listener)
      Delete a specific device.
      void removeDevices(java.lang.String[] deviceIds, ResultListener<java.lang.Boolean> listener)
      Remove multiple devices.
      void resetDevice(java.lang.String deviceId, ResultListener<java.lang.Boolean> listener)
      Reset the specific device to factory settings.
      void sendCommands(java.lang.String deviceId, java.util.List<com.tuya.iotapp.device.bean.DeviceStatusBean> commands, ResultListener<java.lang.Boolean> listener)
      Publish command to device. Depending on the acquired command set, one or more command sets can be published, and whether multiple command sets are supported at the same time depends on the specific product.

    • Method Detail

      • queryDevicesInfo

        void queryDevicesInfo(java.lang.String[] deviceIds,
                      ResultListener<com.tuya.iotapp.device.bean.DeviceListBean> listener)

        Get the full details of a list of devices.

        Parameters:
        deviceIds - A array value represent the device IDs.
        listener - A callback returns the devices if succeed, otherwise a failure.

      • queryDeviceInfo

        void queryDeviceInfo(java.lang.String deviceId,
                     ResultListener<com.tuya.iotapp.device.bean.DeviceBean> listener)

        Get the detail info of the specific device.

        Parameters:
        deviceId - A String value represents the device ID.
        listener - A callback returns the device if succeed, otherwise a failure.

      • modifyDeviceName

        void modifyDeviceName(java.lang.String deviceId,
                      java.lang.String deviceName,
                      ResultListener<java.lang.Boolean> listener)

        Modify the device info.

        Parameters:
        deviceId - A String value represents the device ID.
        deviceName - The new name for this device.
        listener - A callback returns a success state if succeed, otherwise a failure.

      • removeDevice

        void removeDevice(java.lang.String deviceId,
                  ResultListener<java.lang.Boolean> listener)

        Delete a specific device.

        Parameters:
        deviceId - A String value represents the device ID.
        listener - A callback returns a success state if succeed, otherwise a failure.

      • removeDevices

        void removeDevices(java.lang.String[] deviceIds,
                   ResultListener<java.lang.Boolean> listener)

        Remove multiple devices.

        Parameters:
        deviceIds - A array value represent the device IDs.
        listener - A callback returns a success state if succeed, otherwise an failure.

      • resetDevice

        void resetDevice(java.lang.String deviceId,
                 ResultListener<java.lang.Boolean> listener)

        Reset the specific device to factory settings.

        Parameters:
        deviceId - A String value represents the device ID.
        listener - A callback returns a success state if succeed, otherwise a failure.

      • queryDeviceStatus

        void queryDeviceStatus(java.lang.String deviceId,
                       ResultListener<java.util.List> listener)

        Get the latest device status.

        Parameters:
        deviceId - A String value represents the device ID.
        listener - A callback returns a list of DeviceStatusBean if succeed, otherwise a failure.

      • queryDevicesStatus

        void queryDevicesStatus(java.lang.String[] deviceIds,
                        ResultListener<java.util.List> listener)

        Get the latest status of multiple devices.

        Parameters:
        deviceIds - A array value represent the device IDs.
        listener - A callback returns a list of DevicesStatusBean if succeed, otherwise a failure.

      • queryCommandSetWithCategory

        void queryCommandSetWithCategory(java.lang.String category,
                                 ResultListener<com.tuya.iotapp.device.bean.DeviceStandardCommandBean> listener)

        Get the device commandSet set from category name. The commandSet set by category is the richest commandSet set under Tuya public version category for developers to use as a reference. If you are a platform developer, it is recommended that you can follow this category for developing.

        Parameters:
        category - The category name, e.g. kg, cz, dj.
        listener - A callback returns the device category standard commandSet if succeed, otherwise a failure.

      • queryCommandSetWithDeviceId

        void queryCommandSetWithDeviceId(java.lang.String deviceId,
                                 ResultListener<com.tuya.iotapp.device.bean.DeviceStandardCommandBean> listener)

        Get the device v set from deviceID. Query the commandSet supported by the device, and the acquired commands can be used to issue control.

        Parameters:
        deviceId - A String value represents the device ID.
        listener - A callback returns the device category standard commandSet if succeed, otherwise a failure.

      • queryDeviceSpecification

        void queryDeviceSpecification(java.lang.String deviceId,
                              ResultListener<com.tuya.iotapp.device.bean.DeviceSpecificationBean> listener)

        Get device specification properties, including commandSet set and state set.

        Parameters:
        deviceId - A String value represents the device ID.
        listener - A callback returns the device specification if succeed, otherwise a failure.

      • sendCommands

        void sendCommands(java.lang.String deviceId,
                  java.util.List<com.tuya.iotapp.device.bean.DeviceStatusBean> commands,
                  ResultListener<java.lang.Boolean> listener)

        Publish command to device. Depending on the acquired command set, one or more command sets can be published, and whether multiple command sets are supported at the same time depends on the specific product.

        Parameters:
        deviceId - A String represents the deviceID.
        commands - A list of commands which the targeted device will receive, commands: {codeswitch1,valuetrue},{{codevolume,value20}}
        listener - A callback returns success state if succeed, otherwise a failure.
